issue.title: [C++] Add end point options to between kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14900](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14900). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a follow on issue to https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9843 to have options for a <= b <= c, a < b <= c etc.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14900?focusedCommentId=17450489) by Benson Muite (baksmj):*
As indicated in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9843 ,  use `FunctionOptions` https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/compute/function.h#L60
